Title: Set the record of history straight
Publisher: Tianjin renmin meishu chubanshe (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: 'Safe' books devoted to Mao Zedong Thought and subjects related to the Maoist interpretation of reality were essential reading material for leaders at every level, including factory foremen heading the Pi Lin pi Kong campaign (Criticize Lin [Biao], criticize Confucius). The official version of events as it was handed down had to be scrutinized, studied and applied in practice.
Theme: Criticize Lin Biao and Confucius (1974)To Read Too Many Books is Harmful
